attributes.action: Review all politicians yearly salary to reflect the salaries of the people they represent in their constituency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a politician accurately represent the needs & views of their constituency when their lifestyle, funded by UK taxpayers, is such a world apart from the ordinary person on the street? Surely if they were paid in relation to the national average wage they would be better placed to represent the needs of the people. Dont forget that expenses are on top of salaries!
